label: Always Sneaking Up (Card always starts in hand)
Gotcha Now (+4 if Opp. also plays a card in this lane)
Time & Space (Replace lane with a new lane ability)
Take That (+2 to your ability-less cards in the same lane)
Watchful Eye (+5 next turn if no cards played in this lane)
Helping Hands (+1 power to all cards in this lane)
